news_header: A man attacked a famous Incan artefact in Cusco, causing irreversible damage; he was believed to be intoxicated.
news_original_title: Watch: Moment man vandalises ancient Incan artefact
news_text: Footage from Peruvian police shows a man attacking the 12-Angle Stone, causing irreversible damage. The suspect was detained and believed to be intoxicated. The stone is a significant Incan artefact and tourist attraction.
